aboutMe:
Hi, my name is Minh. I've recently finished my 4-year study program of Software Engineering at University Of Information Technology. Regardless of the current state of pandemic, I still yearn for a job opportunity to work in the IT industry.

Upon the fact that I'm a fresher, I'm pleased to cooperate with highly competent people and get myself updated with latest technologies and gain more working experiences.

profile.introduction: Hi, I'm a newly graduated student and currently looking for a job opportunity as a Web Developer

skillInfo.description:
For the last one year, I've been working on multiple Web projects varied from both frontend and backend development. On the progress of working with them, I've learned a lot of essential and highly-demanded techniques. Besides, I'm always considerate of pratical aspects of the project such as project structure, modulization, scalability, etc.

I'm mainly specialised in Javascript / NodeJS. I once worked on Python and AWS as part of my internship as well. Nonetheless, I always prepare myself to adapt and work with other technologies in term of job requirement.

skills: Understanding of essential data structures and algorithms
Decent English reading and listening skills

experiences.content: Complete school program and ready for fulltime job

projects.title: Dictensionary
projects.description: Looks up words on dictionary, saves your word with context and highlights it on every page you visit
